job_title: Community Management Specialist in Toronto, ON
pros: The ODA has really stepped up during the pandemic to not only support it's members and the Ontario public, but also their employees. Necessary equipment for working effectively was delivered to employees, which has made my job a lot easier than my previous job where I was working entirely from my personal laptop and personal phone. My colleagues have all been extremely supportive during the onboarding process, and I have already been presented with opportunities for personal and professional growth in the three months I have been with the organization.
cons: My hiring process took a little longer than I would have liked it to.
